title: Chaplin Comedy
desc: A delightful collection of Charlie Chaplin's most iconic comedic films, showcasing his unparalleled talent for physical comedy, social satire, and timeless storytelling that continues to entertain audiences worldwide.

movies.Title: Weapons
movies.Plot: When all but one child from the same class mysteriously vanish on the same night at exactly the same time, a community is left questioning who or what is behind their disappearance.

movies.Title: The Long Walk
movies.Plot: A group of teenage boys compete in an annual contest known as "The Long Walk," in which they must maintain a certain walking speed or get shot.
